attributes.action: Ban the production of new cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All these measures to introduce cleaner cars are pointless, a car causes more damage to the enviroment when it is being built than when it is being driven around, if the production of new cars was halted, a large amount of greenhouse gases will not be released and traffic levels would not increase, Britains roads would not have to adapt to growing numbers of cars (infact, the amount of traffic could well decrease, as new cars are not as well built as older vehicals and tend to wear out after ten years)

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
